1345510.name: Fantasy Grounds - Black Scrolls Forest of Fallen Giants (Map Tile Pack)
1345510.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Black Scrolls Forest of Fallen Giants (Map Tile Pack)

What could you use a marshy wilderness map made more exciting by skeletons and giants for?
Who were they, how did they get here and most importantly, what kind of creatures have been drawn here by the death and remains of eldritch spells that fill the area? It's the area that sane people stay away from.
What could you use a marshy wilderness map made more exciting by skeletons and giants for?
Who were they, how did they get here and most important, what kind of creatures have been drawn here by the death and remains of eldritch spells that fill the area? It's the area that sane people stay away from.
You could just pass through, but you could also find an important detail of your mission in this forest. The short background story and area descriptions will guide you to prepare your new adventure or to use this map to make your current one easier.
You can plan longer campaigns using the night version, your adventurers will not get bored even at night (if you know what I mean)
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Antal Keninger
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
